title: Foundation Course in Anthroposophic Nursing & Homecare Course
cleaned_text: Foundation Course in Anthroposophic Nursing & Homecare Course Jul 25, 2022 ALL DAY Location Camphill Soltane, Glenmoore, PA Cost $900 Event Contact AN [Course](https://anthroposophy.org/inspire_events_categories/course/), US](https://anthroposophy.org/inspire_events_categories/eastern-region-us/), [Medicine-Health-Therapies](https://anthroposophy.org/inspire_events_categories/health/), [Society-Threefolding](https://anthroposophy.org/inspire_events_categories/social/), [Training](https://anthroposophy.org/inspire_events_categories/training/), [Workshop](https://anthroposophy.org/inspire_events_categories/workshop/) Integrated with Rhythmical Massage Therapy Training Nursing with intent for body, soul, and spirit is the cornerstone of anthroposophic nursing. It is the ability to serve the healing of body, soul, and spirit through applications using natural therapeutic substances in the form of compresses, rhythmical oil applications, hydrotherapy, and care of the senses to name a few. This course provides the foundation for nursing practice as an anthroposophic nurse but will also fulfill requirements for those aspiring to become rhythmical massage therapists as well as practical and inspiring information for lay caregivers.
